content.rendered:
Being able to carry a portable sphygmomanometer is an essential need of many medical professionals, and Klinik Erkameter’s Sphygmomanometer Mercurial Desk Model is a dependable model that can be deployed without difficulty.

Made from break-resistant ABS plastic, it also touts a capillary system that can’t be broken and chromium-plated components that are strong and durable.

Avoiding parallax errors is also simple with its square capillary piece design. Constructed to be ergonomic and compact as well, it is a proven tool in the field, from clinics to emergency rooms. It also allows practitioners to trust in its latex-free parts and auto safety catch, in addition to a new seal that ensures overflow prevention.
